item.title: About
item.description: Iâ€™m a Software Engineer located in Munich, Germany with over 25 years of proven experience developing various small and large, native and managed, low and high level applications and components. Currently, I’m a Team Lead and Architect in JetBrains. I’ve a large experience in C++17, C#, CMake, Kotlin, Common Language Infrastructure (CLI), x86/amd64/aarch64 assemblers, Git, Docker, KVM/QEMU, VMware, VirtualBox, NuGet, Amazone Web Services (AWS).

item.title: Projects
item.description: My job in JetBrains: The profiler core for .NET Framework, .NET Core and Mono in dotTrace, dotMemory and dotCover projects Profiler API (JetBrains.Profiler.Api package) Profiler self-API (JetBrains.Profiler.SelfApi package) TeamCity agent state plugin I created and maintaining the aarch64 TeamCity CI build cluster: Linux blade servers made from Raspberry Pi 4 Model B Linux virtual agents on Marvell ThunderX2 server My own projects: UTF-8/16/32 C++11 header only library for Windows/Linux/MacOs ApiSetSchema v2/v4/v6 dumper The internal Windows structures hack to create the in-process private ETW session Auto elevation loader for Windows (ww898.
